package_description: Comprehensive Mirage-block Weatherlight pack. Focuses on graveyard matters and the set's marquee/returning mechanics: cumulative upkeep, flanking, phasing, and landwalk/landhome-style restrictions. Includes cantrips, recursion, graveyard hate, shuffle-back effects, and a few high-splashy build-around templates inspired by cards like Doomsday and Gaea's Blessing.
